item.title: John add a quote by Aberjhani
item.description: "Feet sandaled with dreams tread paths of vision leading to wisdom’s sharp peaks." -- Aberjhani

item.title: John add a quote by D. Harlan Wilson
item.description: "Reality is shaped by the forces that destroy it." -- D. Harlan Wilson

item.title: John add a quote by David Lynch
item.description: "Ideas are like fish. If you want to catch little fish, you can stay in the shallow water. But if you want to catch the big fish, you’ve got to go deeper. Down deep, the fish are more powerful and more pure.They’re huge and abstract. And they’re very beautiful." -- David Lynch

item.title: John add a quote by Steve Martin
item.description: "A day without sunshine is like, you know, night." -- Steve Martin

item.title: John add a quote by J.D. Salinger
item.description: "I'd just be the catcher in the rye and all. I know it's crazy, but that's the only thing I'd really like to be. I know it's crazy." -- J.D. Salinger

item.title: John add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "New affairs were exciting but they were also hard work. The first kiss, the first fuck had some drama. People were interesting at first. Then later, slowly but surely, all the flaws and madness would manifest themselves. I would become less and less to them; they would mean less and less to me." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: John add a quote by Annabel Joseph
item.description: "I want to mark you, and I want to own you. I want to fucking live inside you." -- Annabel Joseph

item.title: John add a quote by Pablo Picasso
item.description: "Ah, good taste! What a dreadful thing! Taste is the enemy of creativeness." -- Pablo Picasso

item.title: John add a quote by William Makepeace Thackeray
item.description: "Good humor may be said to be one of the very best articles of dress one can wear in society." -- William Makepeace Thackeray

item.title: John add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: John add a quote by Gilles Deleuze & Felix Guattari
item.description: "Only the idea can inject the venom." -- Gilles Deleuze & Felix Guattari

item.title: John add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Body cells replace themselves every month. Even at this very moment. Most everything you think you know about me is nothing more than memories." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: John add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "My Best Friend is a person who will give me a book I have not read." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: John add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "The more I see, the less I know for sure." -- John Lennon
